hypothesis_content.title: Altcoin Liquidity Surge Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: When a top-20 altcoin (excl. BTC/ETH) experiences a >150% spike in 24h volume relative to its 30-day average during a BULL or NEUTRAL regime, and its price is within 15% of its monthly high, a long position will outperform over the next 5 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: A surge in volume near highs during non-bear regimes often indicates new capital inflow or breakout confirmation, especially post-liquidity-crash periods where traders seek high-beta opportunities. The volume filter ensures it's not a low-float pump.
entry_conditions: Asset in approved list (e.g., SOL, AVAX, DOGE)
Enter long at market open following confirmation
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If >60% of such signals result in immediate rejection (price fails to make a new high within 2 days and reverses below entry), the hypothesis is falsified.
